title: [GAMEPLAY] Victorious Morgana Recall Animation Bug
body:
When you recall as Victorious Morgana, she combines two orbs: one light and one dark. Once those two combine into light-dark-orb-thingy for a brief moment before exploding, that combined orb appears over morgana's head rather than in between her hands. The "exploded" orb that she then absorbs is in the right place, though.

Not gamebreaking, but really weird looking. Some patch glitched it, I think?

replies.body: D'oh! Nice catch! Looks like it may have fallen to the wrong buff bone. D: We'll take a look and see what's going on here. Thanks for the report! ^-^
